OpenProject 4.0.1

Â 

OpenProject 4.0.1 was released.
The release fixes installation errors caused by an old version of Sprockets and provides several important security fixes (including a Rails update).
We advise anyone to update their OpenProject installation.

Packager support for easier installation has been extended to also include RHEL, CentOS and Ubuntu (#17165).
Find the current packager version of OpenProject here: OpenProject Packager installation.

For a complete list of changes, please refer to the OpenProject 4.0.1 query.
